results.title: Simvastatin and Muscle: Zebrafish and Chicken Show that the Benefits are not Worth the Damage
results.text_hl: Unfortunately, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ causes unwanted side effects on muscles, such as @DISEASE_Myalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@soreness@@@, tiredness, or @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@weakness@@@.

citations.NLM: Campos LM, Guapyassu L, Gomes C, Midlej V, Benchimol M, Mermelstein C, Costa ML. Simvastatin and Muscle: Zebrafish and Chicken Show that the Benefits are not Worth the Damage Front Cell Dev Biol. 2022;10():778901. PMID: 35359432
citations.BibTeX: @article{35359432, title={Simvastatin and Muscle: Zebrafish and Chicken Show that the Benefits are not Worth the Damage}, author={Campos LM and Guapyassu L and Gomes C and Midlej V and Benchimol M and Mermelstein C and Costa ML}, journal={Front Cell Dev Biol}, volume={10}, pages={778901}}

results.title: Progressive proximal muscle weakness with subacute onset in an elderly patient: a case report
results.text_hl: We present a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ who developed progressive @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@muscle weakness@@@ after taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for the last seven years.

citations.NLM: Martins A, Nadais G, Pinto M, Taipa R, Costa L, Pimenta S. Progressive proximal muscle weakness with subacute onset in an elderly patient: a case report Rev Neurol. 2023 Jan 1;76(1):31-34. PMID: 36544374
citations.BibTeX: @article{36544374, title={Progressive proximal muscle weakness with subacute onset in an elderly patient: a case report}, author={Martins A and Nadais G and Pinto M and Taipa R and Costa L and Pimenta S}, journal={Rev Neurol}, volume={76}, number={1}, pages={31-34}}

results.title: Genvoya-Associated and Simvastatin-Associated Noninflammatory and Nonautoimmune Myopathy: A Case Report and Literature Review.
results.text_hl: Our @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ presented with acute @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@proximal limb weakness@@@ and significantly elevated serum creatine kinase.

citations.NLM: Huang M, Prayson RA, Li Y. Genvoya-Associated and Simvastatin-Associated Noninflammatory and Nonautoimmune Myopathy: A Case Report and Literature Review. J Clin Neuromuscul Dis. 2022 Dec 1;24(2):75-79. PMID: 36409337
citations.BibTeX: @article{36409337, title={Genvoya-Associated and Simvastatin-Associated Noninflammatory and Nonautoimmune Myopathy: A Case Report and Literature Review.}, author={Huang M and Prayson RA and Li Y}, journal={J Clin Neuromuscul Dis}, volume={24}, number={2}, pages={75-79}}

results.title: Statin-associated myasthenic weakness.
results.text_hl: In 2008, two weeks after re-challenge with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 10 mg/day, @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@bulbar weakness@@@ re-occurred Antibody to acetylcholine receptors was measured 4.25 nmole/L.

citations.NLM: Pasutharnchat N, Phanthumchinda K. Statin-associated myasthenic weakness. J Med Assoc Thai. 2011 Feb;94(2):256-8. PMID: 21534375
citations.BibTeX: @article{21534375, title={Statin-associated myasthenic weakness.}, author={Pasutharnchat N and Phanthumchinda K}, journal={J Med Assoc Thai}, volume={94}, number={2}, pages={256-8}}

results.title: Persisting weakness after withdrawal of a statin.
results.text_hl: An 81-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for several years followed by @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ for about 1 year presented with @DISEASE_Fatigue @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@weakness@@@ and @DISEASE_Gait_Disorders_Neurologic @DISEASE_MESH:D020233 @@@unsteady gait@@@.

citations.NLM: Mygland Å, Ljøstad U, Krossnes BK. Persisting weakness after withdrawal of a statin. BMJ Case Rep. 2014 Apr 8;2014():. PMID: 24713712
citations.BibTeX: @article{24713712, title={Persisting weakness after withdrawal of a statin.}, author={Mygland Å and Ljøstad U and Krossnes BK}, journal={BMJ Case Rep}, volume={2014}}

results.title: Simvastatin reduces fibrosis and protects against muscle weakness after massive rotator cuff tear.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ reduces @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ and protects against @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@muscle weakness@@@ after massive @DISEASE_Rotator_Cuff_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D000070636 @@@rotator cuff tear@@@.

citations.NLM: Davis ME, Korn MA, Gumucio JP, Harning JA, Saripalli AL, Bedi A, Mendias CL. Simvastatin reduces fibrosis and protects against muscle weakness after massive rotator cuff tear. J Shoulder Elbow Surg. 2015 Feb;24(2):280-7. PMID: 25213828
citations.BibTeX: @article{25213828, title={Simvastatin reduces fibrosis and protects against muscle weakness after massive rotator cuff tear.}, author={Davis ME and Korn MA and Gumucio JP and Harning JA and Saripalli AL and Bedi A and Mendias CL}, journal={J Shoulder Elbow Surg}, volume={24}, number={2}, pages={280-7}}

results.title: Rapid onset of muscle weakness (rhabdomyolysis) associated with the combined use of simvastatin and colchicine.
results.text_hl: Rapid onset of @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@muscle weakness@@@ (@DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@) associated with the combined use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Colchicine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003078 @@@colchicine@@@.

citations.NLM: Justiniano M, Dold S, Espinoza LR. Rapid onset of muscle weakness (rhabdomyolysis) associated with the combined use of simvastatin and colchicine. J Clin Rheumatol. 2007 Oct;13(5):266-8. PMID: 17921794

citations.NLM: Kandzia I, Kowar M, Frackowiak M, Jacobs AH. [Simvastatin-Induced Myopathy after Dose Increase]. Dtsch Med Wochenschr. 2018 Dec;143(24):1791-1794. PMID: 30508862

results.title: [Severe polymyositis with simvastatin use].
results.text_hl: We present a case of severe @DISEASE_Polymyositis @DISEASE_MESH:D017285 @@@polymyositis@@@ which was likely to be induced by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. CASE REPORT: 75 years old man with @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 20 mg/day for 6 months started previous 2 months with @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@proximal limb weakness@@@, @DISEASE_Deglutition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003680 @@@dysphagia@@@ and @DISEASE_Myalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@myalgias@@@ during exercise that did not release after @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ withdrawal.

citations.NLM: Riesco-Eizaguirre G, Arpa-Gutiérrez FJ, Gutiérrez M, Toribio E. [Severe polymyositis with simvastatin use]. Rev Neurol. 2003 Nov 16-30;37(10):934-6. PMID: 14634922
citations.BibTeX: @article{14634922, title={[Severe polymyositis with simvastatin use].}, author={Riesco-Eizaguirre G and Arpa-Gutiérrez FJ and Gutiérrez M and Toribio E}, journal={Rev Neurol}, volume={37}, number={10}, pages={934-6}}

results.title: [88 years old woman with acute muscular weakness and diffuse muscular pain: have you thought about the drugs?].
results.text_hl: An 88 years old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ was admitted for @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@muscular pain@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@weakness@@@. She was under a treatment of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and was recently prescribed @CHEMICAL_Clarithromycin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017291 @@@clarithromycin@@@ for a @DISEASE_Respiratory_Tract_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D012141 @@@lung infection@@@.

citations.NLM: Arnold Ch, Lamy O, Hagmann N. [88 years old woman with acute muscular weakness and diffuse muscular pain: have you thought about the drugs?]. Praxis (Bern 1994). 2010 Dec 1;99(24):1507-11. PMID: 21125536
